casebody.data:
No. 714,

Misc.

Coleman v. United States. Mr. Justice Brennan and Mr. Justice Stewart are of the opinion that certiorari should be granted. Edward Bennett Williams for petitioner. Solicitor General Cox, Assistant Attorney General Miller, Beatrice Rosenberg and Robert G. Maysack for the United States.

United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit. Certiorari denied.
